title: NASA’s Vision for Space with Charles Bolden
description: How important is space exploration? What’s next? Mars? Europa? Find out when Neil deGrasse Tyson interviews NASA Administrator Maj. Gen. Charles Bolden. Neil is joined in studio by astrophysicist Dr. Michael Shara and Bill Nye.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
